short_summary: Purchase of light scattering airborne particle counters
description: To acquire two light scattering airborne particle counters located in Longueuil, Quebec, Canada. Annex statement of requirement for details.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=============

### Tender Details

* **Title** : Acquisition of Two Light Scattering Airborne Particle Counters
* **Reference Number** : WS4283207973-Doc4287300369
* **Publication Date** : January 3, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date** : January 29, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* **Status** : Expired

### Overview

The Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Department of Health (Health Canada), is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of two light scattering airborne particle counters located in Longueuil, Quebec, Canada.

### Requirements

* The tendered equipment shall be used for the detection and measurement of airborne particles in various applications.
* The bid shall include both technical and commercial proposals that meet the requirements specified in the Statement of Requirement (ANNEX).

### Scope of Work

The work scope includes the delivery, installation, and testing of two light scattering airborne particle counters, as detailed in the Statement of Requirement.

### Business Requirements

* Bidder must demonstrate its ability to deliver the required equipment to Longueuil, Quebec, Canada.
* A copy of the Canadian business permit, Certificate of Registration, will be required with the bid.

### Trade Agreements

* This tender is covered by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Contact Information

* For more information, please contact Adina Ayassou, Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) at adina/ayassou@tpsgc-pwgc.gc.ca.

### Tender File

The tender file is available at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18335136?extsite=MTgzMzUxMzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
